# deactivate()

**Instance Method**

Deactivates the color well.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func deactivate()
```

## Discussion

This method detaches the color well from the system color panel. Future selections in the color panel don’t update the color well’s current color.

## Activating and deactivating color wells

- **activate(_:)**: Activates the color well, displays the color panel, and synchronizes the two UI elements.
- **isActive**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the color well is currently active.
